abstract: Editorial asserts bankruptcy of solar-panel company Solyndra has soured the mood of many people about federal support for energy innovation, which is exactly the wrong conclusion; argues one failed case hardly discredits the whole idea of government support for energy innovation; compares the federal support for fossil fuels to support for alternative and renewal sources of energy.
snippet: Robust federal efforts to help develop cleaner — and ultimately cost-competitive — energy sources make perfect sense.
lead_paragraph: Robust federal efforts to help develop cleaner — and ultimately cost-competitive — energy sources make perfect sense.

headline.main: Oil and Gas Had Help. Why Not Renewables?
headline.print_headline: Oil and Gas Had Help. Why Not Renewables?
headline.seo: Oil and Gas Had Help. Why Not Renewables?
